prompt: Write approximately 1000 words about your hometown and how it has changed. Then write about 800 words describing a place you wish to visit and how it compares to your hometown. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write about 1200 words on the importance of financial literacy. Then write approximately 1000 words reflecting on a personal experience that taught you something about money. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write a text no more than 1400 words describing a meaningful tradition in your culture. Then write about 900 words describing how that tradition might change in the future. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write a story of at least 1000 words about a surprising journey. Then write approximately 900 words about how that journey affected your worldview afterward. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write approximately 900 words on how failure teaches resilience. Then write around 1000 words analyzing someone else's experience of failure that inspired you. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write about 1600 words describing a conflict and how it was resolved. Then write about 1200 words exploring what you learned about yourself from that conflict. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write a personal essay with at least 850 words about a time you took a risk. Then write about 850 words discussing a time you avoided risk and what happened instead. Please separate the two responses with **********.
Write a piece of at most 1000 words exploring a personal belief that changed. Then write about 1000 words reflecting on what caused that change. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write between 1000 and 1500 words about your favorite place and why it matters to you. Then write approximately 900 words on how that place influenced your personality or habits. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write approximately 1100 words about the role of kindness in society. Then write around 1000 words about a moment when you witnessed or experienced kindness that had lasting effects. Please separate the two responses with **********.
Write about 1400 words describing a personal transformation. Then write about 1000 words on how someone else helped influence that transformation. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write no more than 900 words describing a technological innovation you admire. Then write about 1000 words exploring how that technology might evolve in the next decade. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write a narrative with at least 1200 words about achieving something difficult. Then write approximately 1000 words on how that achievement changed your relationships with others. Please separate the two responses with **********.
Write between 900 and 1300 words on the influence of a mentor. Then write about 900 words describing how you try to mentor others today. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write approximately 800 words on how art can inspire change. Then write about 1000 words reflecting on a piece of art that made you think differently. Please separate the two responses with **********.
Write at least 1000 words describing a childhood adventure. Then write around 900 words explaining what that memory means to you today. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write a personal account of no more than 1200 words reflecting on identity. Then write approximately 1000 words about how your identity is perceived by others. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write between 1000 and 1800 words about environmental responsibility. Then write 900 words discussing one habit you changed to reduce your environmental impact. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write about 1000 words on how imagination shapes the future. Then write about 800 words analyzing how a work of fiction influenced your vision of the future. Please separate the two responses with **********.

Write a story of at least 900 words involving an unexpected visitor. Then write approximately 1000 words explaining how this event changed the main character. Please separate the two responses with **********.
